2162.subject: VPA
2162.descrlong: The intriguing images and lively discussions in this course will dig deep into the art movements and experiments that have led to our contemporary art world. Exploring both the provocative and the predictable in the evolution of modernism, students will discover such information as what drove Frida Kahlo¿s self portraits, what made Dali¿s clocks tic, what made Warhol¿s Tomato Soup cans hot.  (Credit/ No Credit Available)
